explanation: Provocative discussions and insights on a range of topics related to venture capital. Reminds me of the importance of being data-driven in my decision making.
David provides evidence on our limiting beliefs and how to push through all of our mind-made stories.
Lays out research findings about how the workings of the brain impacts many aspects of our lives.
I have been following Tim for years. He breaks down high performance individuals with actionable insights.
Jims research provides access to enormous insights on business building. These insights are timeless and very relevant today.
I find the wisdom that Paul shares to be very useful in understanding what we see happening in high growth companies.
In his book, 'no miracles needed, Mark provides a useful framework when thinking about how we build an economy with clean renewable energy.
Ray shares a unique perspective on the world. I find this really helpful when thinking top-down.
Scott enables me to make sense of how difficult it is to start and grow a business.

Alex shares how he thinks about building his wealth through building businesses. I learned about the rule of 100 from Alex.

Fact-based insights on the world of energy and climate. Michael Liebreich is a great host.
